sect1.title: Condor and AFS
sect1.para: If your home is on AFS, than you need to give permissions to Condor to access some of your PoD directories. Namely, Condor needs to have full access to the following folders: $HOME/.PoD/wrk and $HOME/.PoD/log. The last path is the default path for PoD logs. If you changed this path in PoD user defaults settings and a new log directory is also on AFS, than you need to open it accordingly.

You can do that by issuing the following commands:
fs setacl -dir $HOME/.PoD/wrk -acl system:anyuser rlidwk fs setacl -dir $HOME/.PoD/log -acl system:anyuser rlidwk
